content.prompt: Which of the following best explains why Russia puts limits on civil society organizations with foreign sponsorship?

choices.label: Russian leaders are concerned that a vibrant civil society would promote democratization and liberalism by promoting organization and participation.
Russian leaders are concerned that foreign powers might use civil society organizations as large-scale tools of espionage.
Russian leaders are concerned that foreign corporations might slow the economic growth of Russia and weaken domestic productivity.
Russian leaders are concerned that contact with foreigners may accelerate Russia’s “brain drain.”
